en: sound of a bundle of bamboo falling on the ground
sound of a bundle of bamboo falling on the ground

ngiemboon: Azẅɛ̀ʼɛ gie áa na fàʼ yɛ̂ aa kɔ́?
en: What is the profit that exists on this work.
The depth of the pit is not sufficient.

ngiemboon: À kǎa kwɔ̀ʼɔ zẅìŋ, á té yesẅé wɔ́.
en: He carried an old stool, it's not new.

ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn aa kwàʼ zẅíŋ zẅiŋ. Mé té gɔɔn nò á lʉʼ wɔ́.
en: This child is very obedient. He does not refuse what is said to him.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyǎ tsɔ́ zyaga múɔ lê máa pɔ̀ɔn twó yé.
en: I saw a young child with a big bag on his head.
Do you have puberty on your mind?
